body: @samdark For example, if `Model` and `JsonSerializable` are both, should the output of `JsonSerializable` be considered?

issue.title: Fix #16334: Serializer support \JsonSerializable

body:
I think the issue is still present.
In this particular case `Serializer::serialize(MyModel)` is called and since `ActiveRecord` implements `Arrayable` then `Serializer::serializeModel(MyModel)` is called.
At this point the model is turned into an array without serialiazing anything. In fact it is returned `$model->toArray($fields, $expand)` and the only implementation of `toArray` is inside `ArrayableTrait` but inside `ArrayableTrait::toArray` serialize is never called

issue.title: Added support of JsonSerializable interface to ArrayableTrait

repository.name: yii2

body: @samdark yes, issue is still present. I hope my new pr should finally fix it.
